text: Samweli nakawalonjela wanhu weng'ha wa Isilaeli, yolonga, “Wone momgaluchila Mkulu Nguluwi kwa nhumbula za hemwe zeng'ha, lelo mjileche milungu mijenzi na Maashitaloti na kilavya mwemwe baho kwa Mkulu Nguluwi na kumkolela mijito heye yaliyeka, heye kowalohola hemwe kulawa kuli moko ga Wafilisti.”
